page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: There is a lot of transport nowadays.Aeroplanes are a fast and important part of our travel system. But now they are getting more and more dangerous beacause hijackers are getting into planes dressed as civilians and when the plane takes off threaten the pilots with guns to take the plane to a hide out.Air ports are designed for planes to stop for people to get on and off and then take off again.Cars are a growing industry. There are lots of different kinds of cars,but leading makes are advertised on T.V.Road accidents are now common. Boats are used in many different ways. They are used for taking people on holidays, taking trops to war, radio stations in the sea, and for leisure pursuits. If we didn't have transport life would be very different.
